entities: Group of Friends of the Secretary-General
summary:
The Security Council:

* Supports efforts by Georgia and Abkhazia to engage in economic cooperation, including rehabilitation of infrastructure, and welcomes Germany's intention to host a meeting on economic cooperation.
* Underlines that both sides are responsible for providing security and ensuring freedom of movement for UNOMIG, CIS peacekeeping force, and other international personnel.
* Welcomes UNOMIG's efforts to implement the Secretary-General's zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse and requests the Secretary-General to keep the Council informed.
* Extends the mandate of UNOMIG until 15 April 2007.
* Requests the Secretary-General to provide detailed information on developments in the Kodori Valley and progress on refugee and IDP return in his next report.
* Supports the efforts of the Special Representative of the Secretary-General and calls on the Group of Friends to continue their support.
* Decides to remain seized of the matter.
